Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Vastly \Vast"ly\, adv. To a vast extent or degree; very greatly; immensely. --Jer. Taylor. [1913 Webster]

vastly adv : to an exceedingly great extent or degree; "He had vastly overestimated his resources"; "was immensely more important to the project as a scientist than as an administrator" [syn: {immensely}]
